Outline
**********

This tutorial covers basic usage instructions for users and guidelines for developers to
design their own version of GUI.

* Tutorials for users
    #. Installation and setup
    #. Connect with devices
    #. Open GUI
    #. Subject information input
    #. Experimental protocol design
    #. Event number
    #. Oscilloscope
    #. Online monitor
    #. Start the experiment
* Tutorials for developers
    #. Understand the code structure
    #. Design your own GUI
